p.d: Alanis Morissette is one of the most successful female artists and songwriters of all time and has sold in excess of 60 million albums worldwide. Her voice is instantly recognisable and she is a consummate live performer. On 2 July 2012 Alanis Morissette returned to Montreux as part of her Guardian Angel Tour in support of her latest album "Havoc And Bright Lights". It was her third appearance at the festival. The set showcased a number of tracks from the new album alongside classic tracks from across her career. This is Alanis Morissette live at her very best.
